news.title: Intel surges 30% as Nvidia to invest $5 billion in chipmaker, co-develop data center and PC chips
news.summary: N Nvidia will invest $5 billion in Intel as part of a deal to co-develop data center and PC products with the troubled chipmaker.

news.title: David Tepper says Fed could cut a few more times, but easing too much risks entering 'danger territory'
news.summary: His comments come after the central bank lowered interest rates by a quarter point Wednesday. The bank signaled two more reductions are coming this year. The central bank is expected to raise interest rates again in December.

news.title: American Express unveils refreshed Platinum card with $895 annual fee, upping the ante in luxury cards
news.summary: American Express' move highlights an arms race of sorts when it comes to catering to wealthy consumers. JPMorgan and Citi released updated or new cards recently.

news.title: Hassett says Fed made 'prudent call,' signaling White House OK with quarter-point cut
news.summary: Hassett says the administration and new Fed Governor Stephen Miran had been pushing for a bigger reduction. Hassett: "I think we're going to see a reduction in the deficit"

news.title: Here are five key takeaways from the Fed's big interest rate decision
news.summary: The Federal Reserve delivered on a widely anticipated quarter percentage point interest rate cut. The Federal Reserve on Wednesday delivered on an anticipated quarter Percentage Point interest rate reduction.

news.title: I’m a single parent in my 50s. Should I add my adult children, 23 and 29, to my mortgage loan to help me qualify?
news.summary: “I want to purchase a family home so we three don’t have to pay rent,” she says. “I’m looking forward to the day when I can buy a house with my family.”

news.title: ABC pulls Jimmy Kimmel following government pushback over Charlie Kirk comments
news.summary: Kimmel's remarks about the shooting of conservative activist Charlie Kirk drew a rebuke from the Trump administration. ABC said Wednesday that it was pulling late-night host Jimmy Kimmel's show indefinitely.

news.title: Here’s the case for equities to ‘explode higher’ in October. Buy any dips along the way, says JPMorgan.
news.summary: JPMorgan is telling clients to be ready to buy dips, and prepare for a possible explosive move higher for stocks in weeks to come.

news.title: Fed likely to cut rates again in October, and 3 other things we learned from Powell’s press conference
news.summary: Takeaways from conversations and research notes from experienced Fed watchers. Here are the main takeaways culled from conversations, research notes and conversations.

news.title: False alarm: Surge in jobless claims unwinds after recent spike. Layoffs still low.
news.summary: The surge in jobless claims in early September to a four-year high turns out to be a false alarm, at least for now.
